metadata.title: Yaqeen - Cancer Patient Support in Egypt
metadata.description: Egypt's first platform supporting cancer patients and caregivers. Trusted medical information, procedural guides, and psychological support.

hero.badge: An initiative to support Egyptian patients
hero.title: We're With You
hero.subtitle: Egypt's first platform for cancer fighters. Trusted medical information, government procedure guides, and psychological support for you and your family.

guide.title: Treatment Decisions
guide.description: Steps to obtain state-funded treatment and health insurance decisions.

nutrition.title: Your Health in Your Food
nutrition.description: Egyptian food recipes to boost immunity and reduce treatment side effects.

footer.description: Yaqeen is a non-profit initiative, designed by Egyptian hands to serve every patient and caregiver in Egypt. Our goal is to provide you with accurate information, reassure your heart, and save you many trips.
footer.disclaimer: Disclaimer: All medical information on this site is for awareness and guidance purposes only and does not in any way replace consulting a specialist doctor and diagnosing the condition.
